name: Gerrymander: Rig The Election
description:
Gerrymander: Rig The Election is a puzzle game based on the political practice of gerrymandering. What's that? Well play the game to find out!

-50 Levels
-Levels are procedurally generated so they are new each time!
-Try and destroy elections as fast as possible!
-Learn how real politicians manipulate the system in order to win!
-A finalist in the 2017 Australian Game Developer Awards!
publishers: A.R DRIML & A.C HULME & S.D WARTON
